scripts.clean:wasm: docker run --interactive --mount type=bind,source="$(pwd)/..",target=/workdir --rm --tty --workdir /workdir emscripten/emsdk:4.0.10 make clean && shx rm -f src/gs.js src/gs.wasm
scripts.clean: npm run clean:typescript && npm run clean:wasm
scripts.build:wasm: shx cp ../arch/windows-x86-msvc.h ../arch/wasm32-unknown-emscripten.h && docker run --entrypoint /bin/bash --interactive --mount type=bind,source="$(pwd)/..",target=/workdir --rm --tty --workdir /workdir emscripten/emsdk:4.0.10 -c 'apt update && apt install --yes autoconf && NOCONFIGURE=1 ./autogen.sh && emconfigure ./configure CCAUX=gcc --with-arch_h=arch/wasm32-unknown-emscripten.h && emmake make --jobs=$(nproc) XE=".js" GS_LDFLAGS="-s ALLOW_MEMORY_GROWTH=1 -s MODULARIZE=1 -s EXPORT_ES6=1 -s FORCE_FILESYSTEM=1 -s INVOKE_RUN=0 -s EXPORTED_RUNTIME_METHODS=[\"FS\",\"callMain\"]"' && shx cp ../bin/gs.js src/gs.js && shx cp ../bin/gs.wasm src/gs.wasm && shx rm -f ../arch/wasm32-unknown-emscripten.h ../a.wasm
scripts.build:typescript: npm run format && tsc && shx cp src/gs.wasm dist/gs.wasm
scripts.build: npm run build:wasm && npm run build:typescript
scripts.format: prettier --write src/index.ts src/index.test.ts package.json prettier.config.js README.md tsconfig.json
